# Tutorial

This is the tutorial for Spectral-Hub.

## Installation

```bash
pip install spectral-hub
```

## Basic Usage

```python
import spectral_hub as sh

# Load data
data = sh.load_dataset('example')

# Create model
model = sh.create_model()

# Train
model.train(data)
```

## More Information

- Check [API Documentation](/en/api)
- Learn about [Benchmark](/en/benchmark)
